Text.Page: You delivered carving material to Dolme and received a Horn Helm.

Hello, ! Listen, do you have any more of those wonderful carved horns? No?

Hm. Pity...I've started a collection. I tell you what: If you can get some more for me, I'll give you a bottle of my best summer wine!

I think Wahmel and Chelton were offering horn statues as prizes...

Hoho. Thank you. This will do nicely!

You've earned this bottle of summer wine, ! Drink it in good health, hoho!
Participate in the melon bash or splash cannon mini-games to earn horn statues.
